attributes.action: Put a halt to the introduction of the Identity Card
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Identity Card is one of the most fundamental proposed changes to British life  in recent history. There is no viable reason for it's use. It is very expensive and an inappropriate means to combat terrorism, fraud and crime generally. For instance, if 20 billion pounds were put instead put into policing we could double the number of police officers for the next 10 years.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
